Senior Advisory Group (SAG)SAG is a multi-line, Independent Distribution Company serving Insurance Agents and Financial Advisors across America. Established in 2001, our goal has been to provide every agent with three things:•	Thorough analysis of your agency’s insurance needs•	Proprietary, exclusive annuities and life insurance products that are unique with the end user in mind.•	Phenomenal marketing, training and immediate service for your agency.In representing Annexus, Nationwide, Forethought and more, SAG is positioned to research and source the best possible combination of insurance coverage and service for each of our clients. SAG has special relationships with highly rated financial institutions involved in annuity and IUL development which gives your agency strategic advantage in your market place. Why connect with SAG?1.	Our Proprietary IUL Products2.	Truly Uncapped Crediting Strategy3.	172-190 bps more annual interest than traditional strategies*4.	Meaningful income advantage of 26-40% **5.	Ability to give Partial Interest Credit on different types of withdrawals including COIs, regardless of end term date **** ** ***Call and ask for details.See:    http://senioradvisorygroup.com/
